thread.title: It’s the Super Bowl! Why Didn’t I Keep My Nick Foles Jersey?

author: Andrew Beaton
title: It’s the Super Bowl! Why Didn’t I Keep My Nick Foles Jersey?
text:
Dwayne Eckert received a birthday present in 2014 that would have made any Philadelphia Eagles fan envious. It was his very own Nick Foles jersey.
Mr. Foles, the Eagles’ star quarterback at the time, was coming off one of the greatest seasons in National Football League history, and Mr. Eckert was proud to wear his uniform every Sunday.
Then... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
